StarFlier::

She pouted. "Ah, I don't want an upgrade or what ever.  I just want 
to fight."  She followed Perceptor, but she wasn't all that happy
about it.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> "'cause I would like to check your combat skills before you go to 
> battle"said the male"and I need to check if your system is in good 
> shape, little girl... c'mon, it's for your own good..."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > StarFlier::
> > 
> > She looked at Perceptor.  "What? No, I want to fight. I can 
fight. 
> > Sure I may not have nearly enough hours on the field in combat, 
> but I 
> > have the programs to fight and defend myself. Besides, I am a 
full 
> > dragon. We are a rare type of transformer. I know the original 
> > builders didn't want dragons because they were an anomily.  We 
are 
> > capable of flying, have fire breathing capabilities, can out 
> manouver 
> > most plains and similar types, and we can also endure more damage 
> > because of our special metal skins.  I can fight. I just need 
> > training."  Her skin was still shimmering from the drink she had 
> > finished. "Besides, most dragons are made of not only transmetal, 
> but 
> > trimetal.  I just need a little training and I'll be fine."
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Perceptor:
> > > 
> > > "this little addition will do a little more powerfull "replied 
> > > Perceptor"In other way... It highly problaby that Hydras not 
let 
> > you 
> > > go in a fight against MAximals "
> > >
